idea:
We at P.U. Educational Services serve as an educational service provider. We look forward to work with the educational institutions by joining our hands & making education all together a different experience. We serve as helping hand for improving the operational efficiency of the educational institution. We believe in making a quality of education for the ultimate beneficiaries an experience worth remembering. We are committed to serve to all our stakeholders with all possible solutions under one roof.

We are not just a service provider but we also conduct trainings, workshops, study tours & Seminars for the institutions as well as for the corporates. We cater in custom made programs as per organizations requirement.

We are committed towards improving the quality of education with change in time. We are one of our kind & we will always be.
•    Industry relevant courses and curriculum
•    Skill based training and assessment
•    Faculties with rich industry experience and domain expertise
•    Presence in undergraduate colleges, management colleges and corporates
•    Trained more than 3500 students under various Certificate courses with in 3 years of establishment.
name: P.U. EDUCATIONAL SERVICE

idea: Volo Me Is A Platform Which Provides One Stop Solution For Users Not Only Search The Nearby Products & Services But Also Bargain, Buy & Order The Things To Get Delivered At Your Door Step. Now Don't Waste Your Time On Multiple AVolo Mepps For Your Day Today Needs, Volo Me Provides Everything To Anything On One App, Where You Can Order Your Favourite Food From Nearby Restaurants, Buy Groceries, Shop & Bargain On Variety Of Products From Nearby Stores, Hire Freelancers, Electricians, Plumbers, Etc, Also Book Doctor, Financial Professionals Appointments Through Easy Online Payment Mode.
name: VOLO ME PRIVATE LIMITED
